price: Na wao ni mashahidi wa yale waliyo kuwa wakiwafanyia Waumini.
arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ
footnotes: Na wao wapo hapo wamehudhuria kwenye mateso wanayo watendea Waumini.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wahum ʿalā mā yafʿalūna bil-mu'minīna shuhūdun
